duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist the Store Manager with oversight of the Station Store operations, including hiring, supervising, and working with the staff to accomplish daily tasks, bookkeeping, and merchandising.
Maintain high standards and provide fast and friendly service to customers, while supervising and executing the food program.

Lead a team of employees and management, including recruiting, interviewing, hiring, delegation, follow-up, teaching, motivating, planning, organizing, communicating, problem-solving, advocating, and empathizing.
Ensure all shift sales are completed in accordance with company policies and maintain accurate cash, sales, payroll, and inventory control records.

Oversee the activities of store employees, provide feedback to help employees improve performance, implement non-discriminatory related management skills, and maintain a safe environment for employees and customers.
Prepare periodic sales, product, and operating reports as directed by the Store Manager, and attend job-related meetings.
Provide regular and predictable onsite attendance and perform all duties with minimal supervision.
Assist in maintaining proper inventory levels and shift audits, and complete daily store reports and other duties as assigned by the Store Manager.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent, plus 6 months to 1 year of retail and management work experience preferred.
